description.ko: 정교한 PRISM-2 렌즈를 통과하며 굴절의 원리를 통해 찬란한 무지갯빛 스펙트럼으로 분산되는 빛의 경이로운 시각적 여정을 경험해 보세요.
description.en: Experience the stunning visual journey of light as it passes through the advanced PRISM-2 lens, breaking into a vibrant spectrum of colors through the physics of refraction.

prompt: Cinematic macro shot of a sleek, minimalist triangular prism labeled PRISM-2. A brilliant beam of white light enters from the left, refracting into a vivid, glowing rainbow spectrum of colors that illuminates a dark, smoky studio background. Shimmering glass textures, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting.
